1221.content:
Okay your name is Belac You have known of and prepared for the apocalypse for quite a while now you are equipped with tight, thick clothing with Cup under Jurry-rigged Armored Blue Jeans and blue Jean coat plus an armored mask and a Ww2 Steel Helmet and s'mores gloves and Boots you also wear Nice thick Goggles and a PlexiGlass Face shield jury rigged over your helmet.

You have exactly 2500 Bullets for a M16 with a grip, a silencer/suppressor, a masterkey and a grenade attachment with 1500 Shotgun shells And 125 M203 grenades plus a multiple caliber pistol with a Silencer/Suppressor and a grip. You have 200 9mm, 250 .38cal, 175 .40cal and 150 .45caliber rounds.

Now you can either be a loner with an option of joining Leon or Claire later, Start off near one off them or start out helping the Authorities.

So pick, Enjoy and remember be creative, don't kill main character off soon and Write On!
1221.title: Zombie Buff

124.content:
Carlos Oliveira woke up like any normal day, he opened his eyes and brushed the sleep. He ran his fingers through his hair before promptly getting up and getting dressed. Carlos checked in the mirror, and did a quick few fixes in his hair before putting on the rest of his uniform on. Carlos is now a simple police officer, no longer willing to work for anyone higher up in the chain after being practically betrayed by his late comrade. Carlos grabs his handgun from the drawer of his bedside table, which had been left slightly ajar for easy and quick grab.

Carlos walked around the house casually, but suddenly something caught his eye. He glanced out the window to see a mass of people swarming the streets. All of them bumping and shoving each other. And now that Carlos was paying attention, he could swear he heard a few of them scream.
124.title: Carlos

13.content: Are you a male or female Alpha team member?
13.title: New alpha team Member (male/female)

choices: The landing strip is covered with flameing wreckage
The landing strip is quiet abd deserted
131.content:
It's 7:00am and you are walking towards the briefing room, today will be your first mission with Alpha team and it will be one that you wish you could forget, as you enter the briefing you notice that the rest of the time were already there and sit down in an empty chair and wait for the briefing to start.

"How you doing Max"?

You look towards the sound of the voice and see your commanding officer Captain Wilkins standing next to you,you scramble to your feet and quickly salute him.

"Sir i am fine thank you Sir".

"No need to be so formule Max, i was just asking how you were".

You relax and remember that you were told on you transfer day that Captain Wilkins was a easy going man off the battle field, but on it he was one of the best Commanding officers that Team Alpha had seen in almost twenty years, the lights darken and you take your seat agains as Captain Wilkins stands at the front and begins the briefing.

"All right people listen its a big one...Twelve hours ago we lost contact with one of the Umbrella Corpriations head quarters and are squad has been selected to go in and investigate".

"Know as far as we know there was an sos was sent half an hour before all contact was lost, the message was unclear as to what was going on down there but one thing was clear tere had been a security breach on the biohazard level".

"So we are treating this as a possible attempt to steal top secret weapons from the HQ, are mission is to go in and asses the situation before deciding on a plan of action, is that understood".

"YES SIR".

You and your team depart from the breifing rom and head to get ready for the mission, one hour later you are on a transport plane heading to the target location.

When you arive at the Umbrella Headquarters you see that....
131.title: Male

as you click on the flash-light attacthment on you AK and inch forward, while crouching you hear joseph say "hey over here!" you stand up and run over onky to stop as you hear a noise, then you see joseph holding a severed hand on a gun, then scream as one, two then three shadows lunge at him after a thunderous boom from his 12-gague shotgun, as you hear that and several handuns, you flip your AK-47 to single and pop of a few 7.2mm's with a few yelps in response, then your all running to the copter only to see brad waving at you, and reaching out the window with your dad's makarov (stupid) and trying to get ssome shots off as you flag him to get ready when he starts flying away for you to hear "NO DON"T GO!" then realizing futility you pop chris in the shoulder and turn around firing round after round as the others start running for a house wesker pointed outonce inside, SLAM then 2 thuds as you kick the bolts into place hearing scratching, then nothing.

who is it?

you being the zombie buff head first 9mm's in your 1911 and being back to back jack is second with his hand crafted and Bayoneted berreta M9 with a 33 round clip and a 3-round burst option. now heading to the site everything is quiet once you get there the helicopter is in perfect condition minus the rotor blade engine compartment. you search and only the handguns are missing? you both snag a shotgun and 14 shells each then you two retrieve your flashlights and hook them up to your belt. then you decide to stand guard, shotgun ready while jack checks the copter and tries the raadio then all the other electronic equipment. and report "all the electronics are fried!' you nod to him and you are glad he is a aircraft buff as he messes with the controls he pulls a cigg and offers you one, you refuse and hear 3 no 5 sets of bootsteps coming your way. relieved you see people running your direction calling out "hello have you seen bravo team?" you reply "no we have not" then the curios captian asks why you are here and you simply reply that "we wanted to help and it looked like backup was needed." he says thats our job but thanks and "where's the rest of your 4 man team?" you simply replay that "you left them at the barricade to watch over till you returned then you heard kevin shout hey i found somthing!

"hmm alone? interesting. okay then you can help us with" then you say "the bravo team right?" he in awe asks how you knew but before he could say it you said "i heard it on the radio! but i left my 3 teammates behind at the barricade." then he says "welcome then cause i'm deputising you to our team till this is over!" you say "wow really? okay now which way is the crash?" he then says "just follow us"

15121.content:
it wasn't, much but as a young man now, you'd been out and away from the house for a while, had a nice job and a couple of guns for hunting mind you, you've only got 2 hunting weapons.

if it were any other day you wouldn't have nothing on you, but a suprise hunting trip being halted by something crazy happening in town was definatly the worst thing that could happen.

with your German Daddy you'd only have the best in heavy and non heavy of the weapons for hunting of course....he was a bit of.....a Nazi Weapons expert

you had thanks to your dad and mother's concern a nice Mp40 brand new and a shiny black...........plus about 300 rounds in a small pouch on your belt, and you had thanks to your mom you had.....a Scoped Gewher 43...>Enhanced to carry 8mm mauser rounds 150 only

you were Jacob Heinkler

and shit just got real
15121.title: Jacob

Then you said to Matt "My name is......."

info.brief_description: can you survive? or just like Resident evil 3 go down with the cops?
info.description:
this is you but in resident evil as the saga plays from 0 etc or 1 etc YOU will try to survive but it will get harder as you go. After RE 1 it's gonna start to max out your limits! enjoy!

adult is unwanted unless you can keep it to rare or every once in a while maximum

lots of fighting though

I want very little of those OMG RUN LIKE HELL moments because too much will make me seem bad okay? you can put run away as an option but if it's a minor threat unless at the beginning of your saga try not to run away okay?

I now accept Add ons to Outbreak 1 and 2 plus RESIDENT EVIL 5 and on all are valid i will make room for all!


keep it interesting no easy death or easy win

no m/m or f/f so it's fair! no perfect win (no injuries) epic is okay just not to perfect okay?

you have and find very few supplies

hard to come by weapons so don't lose yours! your pistol is always start at 200 bullets from RE 2 to any other resident evil in an Urban/Residential (RE2, RE3, Re4,Re5)it's always 60 for small areas okay?
no super weapons all the time.keep it fun anything IS a weapon but keep it reasonable like YOU rip a pipe off the wall and swing at an ENEMYokay keep it close to resident evil not to far off and no rediculos melee or ranged weapons okay?
